name(An Introductory Crossing)

snap(10,30,5)

sky(205,230,255)
fog(185,214,247)
ground(156,254,97)
polys(207,198,155)

fadefrom(6000)
density(8)

nlaps(3)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(14,0,3900,-90)
set(10,-4000,3900,90)p
chk(40,-6000,3900,90)
set(14,-8000,3900,90)
set(10,-8000,8400,0)p
set(10,-8000,10000,0)p
set(10,-8000,14000,0)p
set(27,-8000,14000,0)pr
fix(41,-8000,18000,-2000,0)s
set(32,-7600,19000,180)pr
set(32,-8400,19000,180)pr
set(10,-8000,19600,0)p
set(10,-8000,25200,0)p
set(14,-8000,29000,0)
chk(40,-8000,27000,0)
set(10,-4000,29000,90)p
set(14,0,29000,180)
chk(40,0,31000,0)
set(10,0,33500,0)p
set(33,0,33000,0)pr
set(33,0,36000,0)pr
set(10,0,38500,0)p
set(33,0,38500,0)pr
set(14,0,42500,-90)
chk(40,-1500,42500,90)
set(14,-3000,42500,0)
set(10,-3000,38000,0)p
set(10,-3000,35300,0)p
set(10,-3000,34000,0)p
set(26,-3000,31000,180)pr
set(23,-3000,32000,0)p

set(23,-3000,26000,180)p
set(26,-3000,27000,0)pr
set(10,-3000,23500,0)p
set(10,-3000,22000,0)p
set(10,-3000,17000,0)p
set(10,-3000,12000,0)p
set(14,-3000,8000,180)
chk(40,-4500,8000,90)
set(14,-6000,8000,90)
set(10,-6000,12000,0)p
set(10,-6000,17000,0)p
set(32,-5600,15000,0)pr
set(10,-6000,19500,0)p
set(10,-6000,23000,0)p
set(10,-6000,24000,0)p
set(26,-6000,31000,180)pr
set(23,-6000,32000,0)p

set(23,-6000,26000,180)p
set(26,-6000,27000,0)pr
set(10,-6000,33500,0)p
set(10,-6000,37000,0)p
chk(40,-6000,39800,0)
set(14,-6000,41000,-90)
set(10,-10000,41000,90)p
set(10,-10910,41000,90)p
set(14,-14910,41000,0)
set(10,-14910,37000,0)p
set(10,-14910,34000,0)p
set(36,-14910,30500,180)ph
set(14,-14910,33000,90)
chk(40,-13410,33000,90)
set(14,-11910,33000,-90)
set(10,-11910,29000,0)p
set(10,-11910,25000,0)p
set(10,-11910,22400,0)p
set(31,-11910,22400,180)pr
fix(41,-11910,13000,-3500,0)s
set(10,-11910,16800,0)p
set(38,-11910,17000,0)p
set(38,-11910,14000,0)p
set(10,-11910,14000,0)p
set(38,-11910,11000,0)p
set(38,-11910,8000,0)p
set(10,-11910,11200,0)p
set(38,-11910,5000,0)p
set(38,-11910,2000,0)p
set(10,-11910,5600,0)p
set(10,-11910,0,180)p
chk(40,-11910,-1000,0)
set(14,-11910,-4550,90)pt
set(32,-8000,-4900,-90)pr
set(10,-7910,-4550,-90)p
set(10,-4550,-4550,90)p
chk(40,-2000,-4550,90)
set(14,0,-4550,180)pt

maxr(13,4000,-10000)
maxb(10,-8400,-17000)
maxt(10,46000,-17000)
maxl(13,-18200,-10000)
